top_comments.comment:
Toilet in kitchen?  
She likes winter sports but puts water tank on outside where it can freeze?  
Shower is surrounded by clothes?  The dampness will put mold into the fabric.
Heavy glass jars rolling around in electrical cabinet?
Propane tanks - how are they going to be accessed for refills?  Does the propane guy have to crawl under van to refill?  This is truly awful design.
The heavy duty toaster oven has zero overhead clearance.  If you operate it inside that cabinet the risk of fire is guaranteed. 

Design of van layout is faulty and not well thought out.  Disappointing.

IMO $350 is stupid-expensive for your course on van life.  I would consider it at $100 but one could buy a year of unlimited access to skillshare or similar  for less than your 50% off price.  I'm not certain your course isn't at the highest ROI, but you've definitely priced it way beyond  my price point.

Glad she mentioned where she's from. I knew I recognized that accent from back home right away. I also find it amusing I'm literally drinking the same thing she's got in the top left section of her fridge as I'm watching this. 🤣

this has to be the best van build setup ive ever seen that i really love. i could totally live like this and be comfortable and content. the sink to shower setup is a fantastic idea. i love everything abt this.

That bed is called a jackknife.  I have seen them in sofas, but never in a bed set up in a van like this.  Did she make this, or hopefully, did she buy this somewhere?  If yes, could information be provided where she purchased the jackknife?  

My son is getting his degree in forestry, and I really want to renovate a van into a camper to visit him while he is doing his internships.  This kind of bed set up would be absolutely perfect!

Wishing you all the best Steph!!

Thank you for sharing. 
You have many talents and passions. 
You are blessed to be young and healthy and in pursuit of adventure. I admire you.
Look I love this channel, I will never and do not live in a van or camper or whatever but the storage and kids rooms ideas it’s just amazing and inspiring.
Your van an you are Beautiful! I wish there were more ladies like you in the USA . Thanks for sharing this video!

Don't take it.
I have never seen a van with this layout and I love it
This van is one of a kind. You have created a unique cozy home on wheels. 😁
